name: No Bull, Just Beef - The Small Business Marketing Podcast
description: Tune into the Spaghetti Agency Podcast for the best in small business marketing. We’re here to tackle social media, content, AI, and ads with a straightforward approach. Join us for episodes filled with practical tips, humour, honest insights, and no fluff. Spaghetti Agency: No Bull, Just Beef. Let’s make marketing exciting and effective, together.

recent_episodes.title: EP 23: From Shit Show to Systems – Getting Your Business Organised
recent_episodes.description:
In this episode of No Bull, Just Beef, Todd and Jo get brutally honest about what it really looks like to run a small business that’s more chaos than control - and how they dragged Spaghetti Agency out of that mess.

They unpack the tell-tale signs your business is a total shit show: turning up late to meetings, terrible password management, no CRM, hunting for your own logo, and flying blind on numbers.

You’ll hear how COVID and a business coach forced them to grow up: putting i

recent_episodes.title: EP 22: The Spagmas Episode – End of Year Reflections & Ridiculousness
recent_episodes.description:
'Tis the season to debrief the chaos!

In this festive end-of-year special, Jo is joined by Hannah, Becky, and Sam for a full-team rundown of what really happened in 2025. From standout marketing wins and Expo antics to AI launches and savage one-liners, no topic (or team member) is safe.

Expect surprise stats, questionable quotes, behind-the-scenes laughs, and some surprisingly heartfelt moments as the team reflects on what made this year a big one for Spaghetti Agency.

recent_episodes.title: EP 21: Beige Is a Choice – How to Stand Out in the Age of AI
recent_episodes.description:
AI can write your posts, plan your content, and maybe even impersonate your brand voice. But does that mean it should?

 

In this episode of No Bull Just Beef, Todd and Jo dive headfirst into the AI hype - and pull no punches. From lazy marketing shortcuts and microwave analogies to deep discomfort with AI-generated music, they explore the messy space between efficiency and authenticity.

 

Expect hot takes, real talk, and a surprising number of references to On

score_reason: Covers AI, content, and marketing for small businesses with practical approach, potentially relevant but audience may be smaller-scale than Andreas's typical clients.
